item.title: Risk and Returns: The Sharpe Ratio
item.description: Loaded, Visualized, and summarized daily stock price data for ‘Amazon’, ‘Facebook’ and ‘S&P500’ Calculated daily stock returns data for ‘Amazon’, ‘Facebook’ and ‘S&P500’ Performed calculations for ‘Excess Returns: S&P 500 VS Stocks’ Computed ‘Mean’ and ‘Standard Deviations’ for Excess Returns Determined ‘Sharpe Ratio’ to help understand the return of an investment compared to its risk Link to GitHub Repository
